EmailTemplate.subject: Healthcare leaders reveal top growth opportunities for 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Insights from healthcare executives The Annual Virtual Care Benchmark Survey, conducted in conjunction with Becker’s Hospital Review, shows how far virtual care has come and where it’s going. We just released our report on the survey, and we don’t want you to miss it.
Our report explores the most consequential trends and opportunities gleaned from this survey of industry leaders, so you’ll have the latest information you need as you build your digital strategy for 2023 and beyond.
Key insights include: 94% of care providers had virtual care programs in place in 2022 or were planning to implement them 61% of organizations are expanding their virtual care programs Leaders are planning to implement in-patient nursing at unprecedented rates, more than any other area of innovation
29% of respondents rank improving engagement as one of their top three goals for telehealth programs These are just a few of the insights included in the report. Download now to get the full story.
